title: Credit Repair Specialist
job_overview:
Job Summary

We are seeking a detail-oriented and customer-focused Credit Repair Specialist to help clients improve their credit standing. The ideal candidate will review credit reports, identify inaccuracies or negative items, and work with credit bureaus and creditors to resolve issues. You will also educate clients on financial habits and credit-building strategies to ensure long-term success.

Key Responsibilities:

* Analyze client credit reports from major bureaus (Experian, Equifax, TransUnion).
* Identify and dispute inaccurate, outdated, or unverifiable information.
* Draft and submit dispute letters to credit bureaus and creditors.
* Follow up on dispute resolutions and track progress.
* Educate clients on credit scores, financial management, and responsible credit usage.
* Maintain up-to-date knowledge of credit reporting laws and consumer rights (e.g., FCRA, FDCPA).
* Provide regular updates to clients and maintain excellent customer service throughout the process.
* Meet individual and team performance goals and deadlines.
* Maintain accurate and confidential client records using CRM software.

Qualifications:

* Prior experience in credit repair, financial services, or customer service strongly preferred.
* Familiarity with credit reports, credit scoring models, and federal credit laws.


 Preferred Skills:


* Knowledge of FCRA, FDCPA, and other relevant regulations.
